sama#Bavaqt tE dEqvA a#bruvan dEvapaqSurvA aqya(gm) sama#BUqt kasmA# iqmamA la#PsyAmahaq ityathaq vai tarhyalpA# pRuthiqvyAsIq-dajA#tAq OSha#dhayaqstAmavi#M ~MvaqSAmA#diqtyEByaqH kAmAqyA&la#Bantaq tatOq vA apra#thata pRuthiqvya-
jA#yaqntauSha#dhayOq yaH kAqmayE#taq prathE#ya paqSuBiqH pra praqjayA# jAyEqyEtiq sa EqtAmavi#M ~MvaqSAmA#diqtyEByaqH kAmAqyA - [  ]  9
